name: Plagueheart Shoulderpads
tooltip:
Plagueheart ShoulderpadsLevel 60

Mataus the Wrathcaster at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands will make Plagueheart Shoulderpads if you bring him the following: 1 Desecrated Shoulderpads, 12 Wartorn Cloth Scraps, 2 Mooncloth and 3 Cured Rugged Hides.

Requirements:
- Desecrated Shoulderpads
- Wartorn Cloth Scrap x 12
- Mooncloth x 2
- Cured Rugged Hide x 3
